org-entry.content-note: media holding incl. INFOR PL SA (professional products, law and economics) and INFOR IT (consulting and IT services)

org-entry.found-date: 1994 as Axel Springer Polska Sp. z.o.o.
org-entry.content-note: name changed as above in 2010 following unification of Ringier AG (Switzerland) and Axel Springer AG (Germany)
subsidiary of Ringier Axel Springer Media AG

publishes two major dailies, Nový Cas . Blikk i Blic and Fakt , and is the country’s second largest magazine publisher, printing popular, fiction, computer, food, economics, news and motoring magazines

address.verbatim-address: 02-486 Warsaw, Al. Jerozolimskie 212, Batory Office Bldg II
